Title: Two Piece Off The Shoulder Evening Dress with Slit

----

Sku: CK27

----

Price: 

----

Sizes: 4, 14, 6, 8, 10, 12

Colors: black

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: CK27-black-two-piece-off-the-shoulder-evening-dress-with-slit_p.jpg

----

Description: Off the shoulder look is separated into a two piece gown. The capped sleeves and bodice are layered with beading and sequins and the trim of the midriff matches the beaded design. The chiffon skirt flows with simple pleating to a court train and has a split in the front.
